March 19, 2011 D Welsh Area (First Section)
Welsh Area (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest Welsh Area welsh-area-first-section National Championship of Great Britain (First Section Final) None Wales
First
Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wright]
Brangwyn Hall, Swansea, Swansea County, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Matthew Jenkins (euphonium) - Pontardulais First two bands qualify for the finals Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £100, 3rd £75. 10 bands competed.
